mil3.7.11:1.6: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, sutapubbo te koci kakacchamano”ti.
mil3.7.11:1.8: “Kim nu kho, maharaja, so saddo kaye namite virameyya”ti.
mil3.7.11:1.10: “So hi nama, maharaja, saddo abhavitakayassa abhavitasilassa abhavitacittassa abhavitapannassa kaye namite viramissati, kim pana bhavitakayassa bhavitasilassa bhavitacittassa bhavitapannassa catutthajjhanam samapannassa assasapassasa na nirujjhissanti”ti.
